name: Dice Attack!
description:
how to play:

  • first, press the 'ROLL' button
  • drag dice into the game board
  • to stack dice, the dice on top must have a value greater than or equal to the dice below
  • the following patterns clear dice and give you points
    • a vertical stack of 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 (straight)
    • a vertical stack of three of a kind or more
    • a horizontal row of three of a kind or more
  • on each turn, you can use the cards on the left once each to change the dice values
  • any dice you do not use will be lost upon starting the next turn
  • try to get a high score! add your score in the comments

score details:

  • clearing a straight give you Fever, which gives you x4 on all scores, but lasts for a limited time (denoted by the top left number)
  • if you make a move that would give you Fever while you still have Fever, you get more Fever time
  • when a clear happens as a result of dice falling from another clear, it's a Combo, which multiplies your score and adds 1 to the multiplier for each clear in the chain
  • Combo stacks with Fever
  • clearing the board gives you a flat bonus

notes:

  • made in 48 hours for the 2022 gmtk game jam
  • if you enjoyed this game, you can play the actually good games that I pillaged with reckless abandon:
    •  Dicey Dungeons
    • Panel de Pon (aka Tetris Attack)
